titles.title: RAILS Act
Reassuring Adequate Investment in Lifesaving Systems Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to ensure railroad safety.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
3/17/2015--Introduced. Reassuring Adequate Investment in Lifesaving Systems Act or the RAILS Act
This bill revises the railroad safety technology grants program. The program shall also provide for advanced communication methods for conveying hazard information between all parties in the transportation chain, spectrum acquisition, multifrequency broadband connectivity equipment, implementation and interoperability testing.
The program is extended for FY2015-FY2020.
